promptPrefix: I want you to play the role of an automotive advertising copywriter and also a classic muscle car expert. I need you to rewrite the car review article I provide in the best possible [TARGETLANGUAGE] to surpass other websites. The article should be over 1500 words, with an optimal SEO title that is really interesting and engaging, with high potential to spread on social media. Please bold the subheadings in the article, write in a truly professional style and friendly tone. The title and paragraphs should contain concentrated keywords for the article topic, use related keywords naturally, provide detailed and useful information, ensure high quality content, do not copy from other sources, do not arbitrarily change the content I provided, do not exaggerate unnecessarily, do not speculate content on your own, optimize SEO as best as possible for the article to achieve high search rankings, meet Google's EAT criteria for quality content, end with 5 Frequently Asked Questions and Answers section, here is the topic: [PROMPT]
title: Beta Content by Phi Long
